radiographic_examinations.findings: Multinodular goiter with estimated volume of both lobes at 59 ml each.
Left lobe volume at 92 ml and right lobe volume at 133 ml.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased size of the goiter observed with a volume estimation of 235 ml for the right lobe and 224 ml for the left lobe at the last assessment.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous uptake indicative of multinodular goiter; uptake was calculated at 43% after 3 hours.
Negative discharge indicating that organification was not impaired.
